verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thank You, Jesus, thank You, Jesus,
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.
Thank You, Jesus, thank You, Jesus,
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You went to Calvary, there You died for me,
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.
You went to Calvary, there You died for me,
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You rose up from the grave,
New life to me You gave,
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.
You rose up from the grave,
New life to me You gave,
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sing Hallelujah! Sing Hallelujah!
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.
Sing Hallelujah! Sing Hallelujah!
Thank You, Lord, for loving me.
